item.title: Cape Town, South Africa
item.description: Everybody has a list. A bucket list, travel list, a hit list (jk). Something special holds the top spot, something that makes you more excited and giddy than every other option. For years, South Africa has held that spot on my list. Despite constant eagerness, this trip just wasnâ€™t in the cards until recently, and I think it worked out for the best.
